name: MetalGreymon_X
description: MetalGreymon X is a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody . Both its flesh portions and remodelled portions are perfectly well-balanced, possibly because of how intense the power it had obtained was. The "Trident Arm VER 9.9" on its left arm has a control program set in its DigiCore that has been upgraded to its limit, and possesses the energy equivalent of a single shot of "Giga Destroyer" in just one swing, so it is an offensive force that must never be endured in close combat.
